findings.title: Problematic check due to the division
findings.description: The check at line 78 in the initialize function of Maintainer.sol is somewhat problematic, i.e., 50% cannot be guaranteed due to the division.

findings.title: The validator can be changed by the owner of the Maintainer contract
findings.description: According to the contract, the changeValidators function can be invoked by the contract owner. However, this violates the security design of the contact.

findings.title: Check whether the validators have repeated addresses in the initialize function of the Maintainer contract
findings.description: Check whether the validators have repeated addresses in the initialize function of the Maintainer contract.

findings.title: Imprecise Amounts with Elastic Tokens
findings.description: Elastic tokens may lead to imprecise amounts being recorded, e.g., in the LockToken function.
